Home » 40P23 Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)
25 Pītittika, Kusalattika
Pītittika, Kusalattika
34.
109Napītisahagataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā pītisahagato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa…pe…  avigate aṭṭhavīsa.
110Napītisahagataṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā pītisahagato akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa…pe…  avigate aṭṭhavīsa.
111Napītisahagato naabyākato dhammo pītisahagatassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Ārammaṇe aṭṭhavīsa, adhipatiyā anantare aṭṭhavīsa…pe…  upanissaye aṭṭhavīsa, kamme catuvīsa, natthiyā vigate aṭṭhavīsa.
